title: kalista's passive slightly over powered
body:
i've noticed a lot of Kalista players lately and i can see why that is, early game she is killable and easy to handle but when it comes to the 25-30minute mark she is practically untouchable,  for example: we had a ezreal with frozen gauntlet, a vi with max cd and a blitz with boots of swiftness and alacicity upgrade and we couldnt catch her 1v3 even whilst hitting her constantly with frozen gauntlet and red buff, , i just think that it should atleast have a cd of like 2-3 seconds to make it possible to catch her late game? what do you guys think, 

i do play kalista myself and i know that i can 1v1 anybody with the superior kite and thats why i know its over powered

replies.body: There are so few people who actually know how to use her passive well, its OP for a reason its difficult to master

The problem is that the brunt of the CC you are putting on her is slows.
She's pretty much Master Yi when hit with slows, as long as she has a target to attack.
I say don't touch her or else she will become eve 2.0
I say slightly nerf the distance she hops.
